reviewText: The Dawn of the Dragon Racers is a fine Toon ,  very enjoy able to watch. Hope more Dragon Toons are made as well. Jim
Arrived on time and as specified;
My son loves this movie so much that he keeps watching it over and over!
this was a cute movie for the order. I thought it was going to be longer than 60 minutes however my daughter who is 5, loved it.

Just pre-ordered. Usually not a fan of "short films". But this also includes the very hard to find short films LEGEND OF THE BONEKNAPPER DRAGON and BOOK OF DRAGONS. Thats 3 half hour shorts for $6.50 and its everything the kids are lacking for the complete collection.
I absolutely do not care for animated "short" films that are 20-30 minutes long. it's just not worth the purchase
Terrible series.  Waste of time. Nothing near as good as the movies
Perfect and just as described! :)
great price

Bought the entire series for my grandchildren.  We already had both the 1st and 2nd/last movie.  Every One even adults were thrilled with watching them and filling in all the missing gaps. Was very entertaining to all ages.  Is a must if you have the 1st and 2nd/last movie.  Buy the Complete Series to see why, what, when and so forth
The disc plays very well and didn't need too much clean-up.
Watched on TV first then again on DVD - loved it
My kids fav show/movie love it. Have every DVD :) Thanks :)
My niece will now have the complete series which she would watch the whole day if allowed.  I enjoy watching the shows with her and we both love Toothless.
Really an excellent movie full of laughter, fun and excitement.  A MUST have and see if you are a Dragon Riders fan.  I just wish it had been longer.
Excellent...It met all expectations.

good

I saw the running time on this at about 60 minutes, that it was a continuation of the movies and TV episodes, and picked it up for ten bucks. Listing this title at a 60-minute running time without clearly marking the packaging that the one new feature only runs about 20 minutes is a case of retail bait-and-switch, like the various Dreamworks' 20 minute holiday shorts packaged on what could be a feature length DVD.
love the movie.
our 14 year old grandson loves these movies
I love it

I loved the VERY VERY Short movie. It was way over priced, but if your kids enjoy Hiccup and Toothless this disc tells the story how dragon racing began.  I didn't give 5 stars because the price was to high for a 28 minutes episode.
Could be better. I would give it 5 stars if all 3 episodes were new, but what's not to like about Dragons?
I liked the story.
Not what I want at all

This is good for people of all ages. Its' fun and instructive for kids.
Perfectly priced for the length of the movies, my daughter love this.
addition to my dvd collection very pleased with purchase

Drivel.  Whiny-voiced characters who promote a callous attitude to animal abuse (film opens with teenagers propelling sheep out of a giant slingshot for 'training').  If they're being raised on dreck like this, it's no wonder some kids treat pets and farm animals as disposable commodities with no ability to feel fear and pain.
This was a gift for my grandson,  He loves How to Train your Dragon, and Dragon Defenders of Bert, etc.  he watched them often and enjoys it every time
Nice
I couldn't figure out what voice Tim Conway played and even looked for the non-existent voice credits, but I'll never get enough Dragon movies. Keep them coming, please!
AWESOME !
loved it. great addition to the series.

The title episode is great. Brings it back to where the show ended but before the 2nd movie has taken place.  The two bonus features are totally different and are basically a cartoon story within the animation. My son loves this series but was not impressed by the two bonuses.  Overall for the price I'm happy with the one episode but it also shipped later than I was guaranteed.
I love it Thank you

Production is great, story line is good, and it worked without a problem.
My 4-year old loves it, but then she loves everything with Toothless in it.
Love the series hope the rest comes out on DVD too
My grandson loves this DVD. Awesome series.

This is a fun movie with Hiccup as an older teenager reminiscing with his friends on how Dragon Races first started. There is no cussing or using God's name in vain in these episodes, however, there is a lot of using mythological god's names used instead (weird). If you're a fan of Hiccup and the gang, this DVD is a must.
Kids love it
played great love it.
Good movie.  The kids enjoy all of the Dragons series.
Thanks

This is a fun little short that tells you the story of how Berk started Dragon Racing. This short takes place after Defenders of Berk and before Race to the Edge of the Dreamworks Dragons TV show. Hiccup and his friend start reminiscing on the past where they first came up with the idea for Dragon Racing. If you're a fan of Dreamworks Dragons, this will be very entertaining for you and a great addition to your collection if you love the TV series.
